response: Introducing the 2023 Harley Davidson Nightster Special, a new middleweight contender that amplifies the sportster motorcycle experience. It features all LED lighting, premium Brembo braking components, a 3.1-gallon fuel cell for improved handling, selectable ride modes, and adjustable brake and clutch levers. Available in classic and bold colors, it also offers a passenger pillion, footpegs, cast aluminum wheels with a tire pressure monitoring system, and a comfortable five-inch handlebar riser. The four-inch round TFT screen displays all the instrumentation and infotainment functions, managed by hand control buttons. Powered by the Revolution Max 975T powertrain, the Nightster Special is a thrilling addition to the 2023 lineup.
title: MY23 Nightster & Nightster Special_11_01.mp4
